arts.ttl: Gary Neville claims ¬£74m star is 'nowhere near up to speed' and highlights 'strange' decision by Ruben Amorim in 1-1 draw with Fulham
arts.sum: Speaking on the Gary Neville Podcast after the match, the former United defender said there was a 'clamour' to field the player in question from the start despite his recent arrival at the club.

arts.ttl: Fulham star fumes at Man United's controversial goal in draw as he claims it 'should have been disallowed'
arts.sum: A Fulham defender has expressed his anger that Manchester United's goal at Craven Cottage on Sunday was allowed to stand.

arts.ttl: The three players Man Utd MUST sign after disappointing Fulham draw
arts.sum: While they played well a week ago against Arsenal, today the performance was embarrassingly bad and highlighted the drastic need Man Utd have for more signings in the transfer market. Blessed with impressive physical traits and a keen sense of defensive awareness, Dorgu is a reliable left wing-back for Man Utd. When the team is in full flow and everything is working through Bryan Mbeumo and Matheus Cunha, while Lisandro Martinez is in the team to run the build-up play from the left side of defence, Dorgu will provide a nice counterweight to all the ball-dominant players.

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes reveals why he WAS 'upset' after referee collision before 'triggered' Man United captain skied dreadful penalty over the bar in Fulham draw
arts.sum: The United captain admitted he was upset that Kavanagh didn't say sorry for disrupting his penalty-taking routine in the 1-1 draw at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: New season, same struggling Man United: Myriad problems across the pitch exposed at Fulham
arts.sum: Where are Man United struggling so far this season? Well, to start: goalkeeper, captain, midfielders, goal-scorers and more...

arts.ttl: Fernandes misses penalty as Man Utd draw at Fulham
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes misses a penalty in the first half as Manchester United draw 1-1 against Fulham at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Amorim delivers firm message to Man United players after Fulham draw
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says that the Red Devils "have to grow up a lot as a team" following Sunday's draw with Fulham.
